about_the_game: For those who want to experience King of Texas in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
King of Texas involves the main character romancing women with the goal of a sexual encounter. It includes sexual themes and depictions featuring undressing, nudity and sexual interactions. Depictions are consensual between all parties. 

Graphic depictions of vaginal sex and foreplay.

detailed_description: For those who want to experience King of Texas in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: King of Texas Adults Only 18+ Patch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: For those who want to experience King of Texas in its full adults only glory. This DLC adds the adults only content to the game.
